problem.markdown:
>>An array of wind turbines will NOT adversely impact which of the following?<< () bird and bat deaths (x) grazing cattle () aesthetics () noise
[explanation] Wind turbines are noisy, to many people not aesthetically pleasing, and may cause bird and bat deaths. However, one advantage of wind turbines is that you can use the area around them for other purposes, like grazing cattle. [explanation]
problem.p: An array of wind turbines will NOT adversely impact which of the following?

choicegroup.label: An array of wind turbines will NOT adversely impact which of the following?

div.p: Wind turbines are noisy, to many people not aesthetically pleasing, and may cause bird and bat deaths. However, one advantage of wind turbines is that you can use the area around them for other purposes, like grazing cattle.
